name: 'Little Nicky' Trivia Quiz | Little Nicky | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of the following stars is not in the movie?
questions.explanation:
Danny DeVito.

	Jon Lovitz plays the man who thinks he is a bird, Rodney Dangerfield plays the devil's father and Blake Clark plays the devil's demon.

Chicken.

	It is Popeye's Chicken to be exact.

questions.text: Who hit Nicky in the face with a shovel, and made his face crooked.
questions.explanation:
Cassius.

	Valerie hit him, but made it straight again.

questions.text: What city was 'Little Nicky' filmed in?
When Adrian and Cassius lock the gates of hell, what happens to the devil?
options: he dies a slow and painful death
questions.explanation:
he starts to deteriorate.

	He is deteriorating because no souls can get through the gates, which makes the devil disintegrate.

questions.text: What did Nicky turn Coke into?
Cassius was the first person to get in the flask.
How did Nicky die the first time he was on earth?
questions.correct: he got hit by a train
options: he got hit by a bus
he was eaten by a polar bear
questions.explanation:
he got hit by a train.

	'I got hit by a big light, attached to a lot of metal.'

questions.text: What is the name of Nicky's dog?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Beefy

	He is a talking dog that helps Nicky save his father.
